title: Client Issues
body: I click launch when the client pops up, it disappears and then nothing happens. I've tried to close the client and patcher through task manager. i've tried to run as administrator. What can i do to fix this?

replies.body:
Hey there,

Have you tried running the game in compatibility mode?

Could you try running the [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) for me (Run as Administrator)
